diff_act: 1.adjust the refresh rate via the database

regen.new_specification: The system shall deliver non-critical alarm notifications to the operator's workstation in a timely manner, with a maximum delay of 5 seconds, regardless of operator login status.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling non-critical alarm notifications
regen.new_specification: The system shall deliver non-critical alarm notifications to the operator's workstation within a reasonable time frame, as defined in the database.

regen.absent_element: adjustable refresh rate of facility map via GUI
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to adjust the facility map refresh rate via the graphical user interface.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
